definition: the act of moving back and forth, move back and forth very rapidly
details:
noun
- the act of moving back and forth
= synonyms: flutter
- North American woodpecker
- a momentary flash of light
= synonyms: glint, spark
verb
- move back and forth very rapidly
= example: move back and forth very rapidly
= synonyms: flutter
- flash intermittently
= synonyms: flick
- shine unsteadily
= example: shine unsteadily
= synonyms: flick
